The true doctrine of justification asserted and vindicated, from the errours of Papists, Arminians, Socinians, and more especially Antinomians in XXX lectures preached at Lawrence-Iury, London / by Anthony Burgess ... Burgess, Anthony, d. 1664.
The second edition, corrected and revised.
[16], 272, [7] p.
Printed by A. Miller for Tho. Underhill ..., London : 1651.
"The table" [i.e. index]: p. [1]-[7] at end. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
